actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to condition U.S. membership in the International Criminal Police Organization upon such organization agreeing to comply with the provisions of the United States Code relating to the protection of individual privacy from misuse of Government records.

summary.text: Conditions United States membership in the International Criminal Police Organization upon agreement by such organization to comply with provisions of Federal law relating to the protection of individual privacy from misuse of government records.

titles.title: A bill to condition U.S. membership in the International Criminal Police Organization upon such organization agreeing to comply with the provisions of the United States Code relating to the protection of individual privacy from misuse of Government records.
